title: Three to Get ready
description: Survivalists become the target of a homicidal maniac.Blake Franklin must stop him before he brings about the end of their days.An ending for which, even they had not planned.J oin the Franklin Team as they take on wanton criminals set upon murder and mayhem in Texas.Stock up on water, ammunition and courage - prepare for the worst.Underground bunkers are not secure from evil.Blake must bring criminals into the light of day.Three to Get Ready is a gripping thriller you must read.
author: Ryan   Hale
